title: Miix Music
summary: Miix recommends a playlist based on a group of friends/ family members' shared music listening history.  It runs a series of get and post requests to Spotify web API endpoints.  We utilised React JS, and Bootstrap, whilst working in an agile way on this team project.
tech: React JS | JavaScript | Bootstrap | HTML | CSS

title: Meal Planner
summary: Meal Planner enables tailored recipe searches to inspire people to cook.  It’s inclusive to those with allergies or following restricted diets.  It was built using JQuery, CSS, HTML and bootstrap.  We utilised the Spoonacular API and agile methodology on this team project.

title: Weather Dashboard
summary: This weather dashboard enables users to enter a city name to search for weather conditions from today through to the next five days.  Data is sourced from the OpenWeather API.  It was built using JQuery, Bootstrap, CSS and Moment JS.
tech: JQuery | JavaScript | Bootstrap | HTML | CSS | Moment JS

title: Workday Scheduler
summary: This application allows users to add calendar entries, which persist between refreshes, and formats entries according to whether they are in the present, future or past.  It also displays the current day at the top of the page.
tech: JQuery | JavaScript | Bootstrap |  HTML |  CSS | Moment JS

title: JavaScript quiz
summary: The website allows users to test their JavaScript knowledge through a series of questions and provides instant feedback over their response. The user receives a score at the end of the quiz to show how well they have performed.

title: Password Generator
summary: The password generator allows users to create a password based on user defined criteria, between 10 and 64 characters long.

title: Bootstrap Portfolio
summary: This website was my first attempt at building a portfolio page using Bootstrap.  It highlights projects I’ve worked on.
